description:
This is an Introductory course on Project Management based on PMBOK Guide 5th Edition by PMI.

  • You will be provided an overview through our high quality videos lectures and study guides in this course.
  • You can find a study guide at the end of each chapter in this course.
  • Here we are going to cover the first two knowledge area out of the ten knowledge areas covered in the complete PMP course.

To access the remaining material like simulated tests, additional chapter test, mobile application, chapter study guides and PMP exam tips please visit the Free Demo Online course page in the free resources tab on the PMstudy homepage.

Happy Learning!
title: Introduction to PMP Exam; Includes 10 Free PMI PDUs
